name: RowBoat Labs
headline: LLM agents for customer support in fintech
description: RowBoat Labs offers pre-trained LLM agents for customer support, which continuously learn from usage. Our LLMs are safe and brand-aligned. RowBoat agents seamlessly integrate into your systems and take actions where necessary.
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:b2b; industry:api; industry:customer-support; industry:conversational-ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Arjun Maheswaran, Founder
founders.description: I previously co-founded an AI startup that was acquired by Coinbase. Fun fact: I hold a patent from 2020 on controlling LLM generation with reinforcement learning.

founders.name: Ramnique Singh, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at RowBoat Labs. Helping companies supercharge CX using LLMs.

founders.name: Akhilesh Sudhakar, Founder
founders.description: Building LLM agents for customer support at RowBoat Labs. Most recently, led generative AI product for CX at Coinbase. Previously, ML scientist at Agara AI (autonomous customer support).

One-stop for all your agentic customer support tooling needs 
Build. Collaborate. Accelerate. All your AI CX workflows in one place. 
RowBoat covers the end-to-end needs of CX teams and developers alike
BUILD
01
Simplify collaboration across teams
RowBoat makes it easy for CX teams and engineering teams to collaborate across organizational silos, to build powerful customer experiences.
[Start Collaborating](https://www.rowboatlabs.com/</pricing>)

Build complex assistants using plain language

Delight your customers while driving efficiency
## 95%
Customer Satisfaction Score
### 3x
Automated Resolution Rate
### 2x
FasterIteration Time
**Enhance collaboration between CX teams and developers.**
Save time. Reduce back-and-forth. Eliminate silos.
[CX Teams](https://www.rowboatlabs.com/</pricing>)[Developers](https://www.rowboatlabs.com/</developers>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677da05b3af0516a05e3d9bb/677ef31b3bc25512e0740b32_ux%20\(1\)%201.png)
**One platform,****endless use cases**
Create agents, define tools and shape them into powerful assistants
[Fintech](https://www.rowboatlabs.com/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-0>)[Insurance](https://www.rowboatlabs.com/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-1>)[Travel](https://www.rowboatlabs.com/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-2>)[Telecom](https://www.rowboatlabs.com/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-3>)[Banking](https://www.rowboatlabs.com/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-4>)
### Payment Reminders
Automate personalized reminders for upcoming payments and due dates to prevent late fees.
### Credit Card Support
Manage credit card services, including limit adjustments, card blocking, and transaction disputes.
### Account Information
Enable seamless access to account balances, recent transactions, and detailed account summaries.
### Premium Payment Support
Facilitate premium payments and send timely reminders for upcoming due dates.
### Claim Status Updates
Keep customers informed about the status of their insurance claims and required next steps.
### Policy Management
Simplify access to policy details, including coverage information and policyholder updates.
### Real-time Trip Updates
Deliver real-time updates on trip details, including flight status and hotel check-in information.
### Booking Assistance
Support customers in making, modifying, or canceling travel bookings seamlessly.
### Trip Modifications
Handle changes to itineraries, such as date adjustments and service add-ons.
### Connectivity Support
Provide troubleshooting steps and guidance for resolving common network-related issues.
### Billing Assistance
Address customer inquiries related to billing, payments, and due date notifications.
### Plan Upgrades
Offer personalized plan upgrade recommendations based on customer usage patterns.
### Loan EMI Breakdown
Deliver detailed loan repayment schedules and amortization summaries for customer reference.
### Fund Transfers
Enable secure, real-time transfers between accounts or to external beneficiaries.
### Account Overview
Provide customers with an instant overview of their accounts, including balances and activities.
Get a hands-on tour or jump right in.
**Increase CSAT. Reduce costs. Improve CX**

generated_description:
### RowBoat Labs: Pioneering AI-Driven Customer Support

**Overview**
Founded in 2024, RowBoat Labs is a fresh entrant into the artificial intelligence domain, particularly focused on enhancing customer support within the fintech industry. Located in San Francisco and part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, the company operates with a small but dedicated team of three professionals.

**Mission**
RowBoat Labs aims to revolutionize customer service by offering **pre-trained LLM (Large Language Model) agents** that are not only brand-aligned and safe but also capable of continuous learning from their interactions. Their mission is to provide innovative LLM agents that streamline customer support processes across the fintech landscape.

**Product Offerings**
RowBoat Labs provides a multi-agent customer support platform that integrates seamlessly into existing systems. Here are some key features:

- **Collaboration**: Simplifies synergy between customer experience (CX) teams and engineering, breaking down silos for a more cohesive workflow.
- **Ease of Use**: Non-technical teams can build complex assistants using straightforward language, making it accessible for a broader audience.
- **Comprehensive Support**: The platform claims to expedite the transition to advanced multi-agent systems, enabling enterprises to harness AI’s full potential effortlessly.

The solution is built to handle diverse fintech applications, including payment reminders, credit card support, account information management, and claim status updates, among others. Their open-source approach appeals to enterprise teams looking to innovate in customer interactions.

**Impressive Metrics**
RowBoat Labs boasts impressive operational metrics:
- A 95% customer satisfaction score.
- A threefold increase in automated resolution rates.
- A twofold enhancement in iteration speed.

**Community & Support**
RowBoat Labs encourages collaboration and knowledge sharing via platforms like Github and Discord, fostering a community of developers and users enthusiastic about advancing customer support technologies.

**Conclusion**
In a nutshell, RowBoat Labs stands out by marrying advanced AI capabilities with user-friendly interfaces and robust integration options. Their forward-thinking approach is set to transform the way customer support operates in fintech, making interactions smarter and more efficient. If you’re interested in exploring their offerings, check out their website at [RowBoat Labs](https://www.rowboatlabs.com). 

So, if you’re in fintech and looking to leverage AI for better customer service, RowBoat Labs just might be the partner you need.
